settings.content: At the forefront of the range is a single outerwear piece, namely the Permanent Vacation Smart Jacket in Antique White. A slightly oversized summer jacket, it has asymmetric pockets with a layered popper and zipper fastening to the front and sophisticated shirt collar.At the forefront of the range is a single outerwear piece, The cotton jacket has a lightweight Read more
